enhanced_by.reason: The 'required' field is directly checked in the 'isCoreChanged' method, so setting it is crucial for testing different scenarios.
The 'deprecated' field is also checked in 'isCoreChanged', making it necessary to set this state for comprehensive testing.
The 'style' field is evaluated in 'isCoreChanged', so setting it will help in testing different conditions.

The 'isChanged' method in the 'ComposedChanged' interface evaluates changes similarly to 'isCoreChanged', providing a basis for assertions.
